Class FlightBookingSystem

java.lang.Object
bcu.cmp5332.bookingsystem.model.FlightBookingSystem
public class FlightBookingSystem extends Object
Central class that manages the flight booking system. Handles flights, customers, bookings, and their interactions.

      public Flight getFlightByID(int id) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Retrieves a flight by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the flight ID
      Returns:
      the flight if found
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if flight doesn't exist or is deleted

    • addFlight

      public void addFlight(Flight flight) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new flight to the system. Checks for duplicate flight numbers on the same date.
      Parameters:
      flight - the flight to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if duplicate ID or flight number exists

    • addCustomer

      public void addCustomer(Customer customer) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Adds a new customer to the system. Ensures unique names and email addresses among active customers.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if duplicate name, email, or ID exists

    • getBookings

      public List<Booking> getBookings()
      Returns:
      defensive copy of all bookings

      public List<Booking> getCancelledBookings()
      Returns:
      defensive copy of cancelled bookings

    • addBooking

      public Booking addBooking(int customerId, int flightId, LocalDate bookingDate) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Creates a new booking for a customer on a flight.
      Parameters:
      customerId - customer making the booking
      flightId - flight to book
      bookingDate - date when booking is made
      Returns:
      the created booking
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if customer/flight not found or flight full

    • cancelBooking

      public void cancelBooking(int bookingId, double cancellationFee) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Cancels a booking and processes refund.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - booking to cancel
      cancellationFee - fee to charge for cancellation
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if booking not found

    • removeCustomer

      public void removeCustomer(int customerId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Removes a customer and cancels all their bookings.
      Parameters:
      customerId - customer to remove
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if customer not found

    • removeFlight

      public void removeFlight(int flightId) throws FlightBookingSystemException
      Marks a flight as deleted.
      Parameters:
      flightId - flight to remove
      Throws:
      FlightBookingSystemException - if flight not found
